utmDescription: UTM (Urchin Tracking Module) parameters are tags added to a URL to help you track the effectiveness of your marketing campaigns across traffic sources and publishing media.
utmBenefits: Using UTM links allows you to:
benefit1: Identify which campaigns are driving the most traffic
benefit2: Understand which content is most effective
benefit3: Optimize your marketing efforts based on data
